rules: Always use useShallow for object/array selectors
Single primitive selectors don't need useShallow
Infer types from schema with z.infer<typeof schema>
Use cn() helper for conditional classes
Use cva for component variants if class-variance-authority installed

universalRules.keys: Stable unique IDs only, never index
universalRules.memoization: useMemo for calculations, useCallback for handlers passed to memo children
universalRules.exports: Named exports preferred, avoid default exports
